message.content:
Michael Scott: Hey there, folks! Michael Scott here, your friendly neighborhood tourist attraction enthusiast! Now, when it comes to San Francisco, there are a few must-see spots that you just can't miss. First up, we have Fisherman's Wharf! It's a bustling waterfront area with tons of delicious seafood, street performers, and even a chance to see some sea lions lounging around. Trust me, it's a real treat!
